body.name: LED Desk Lamp, Architect Desk Lamps for Home Office, Adjustable Swing Arm Table Lamp, Eye Caring Reading Lamp, Memory Desk Light Dimmable with 3 Color Modes & 9 Brightness Tall Task Light
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 4 mins
features: 🎁【High-Quality LED Desk Lamp 】 It is an expensive table lamp, but it is great, And it is worth it. Tall desk lamp, Adjustable, Dimmable, different Color temperature modes, Bright, Eye Care, Memory function. Great led desk light for Home Office or as Monitor lights for your computer.

🎁【LED Auto-dimming & Eye-Caring Desk Lamps for home office】 Three-dimensional light source, emitting soft light without flickering and ghosting, color rendering index reaches Ra≥95, no blue light hazard; built-in ambient light sensor device, the lamp desk light automatically adjusts to reduce the contrast between light and dark to achieve the purpose of soothing eye fatigue, creating a comfortable eye environment.

🎁【3 Lighting Modes & 9 level Brightness Task Lamp Desk】Easily control 3 color temperatures (3500K, 4000K, 5000K) and 3 modes (Work/Reading/Auto Mode) through a sensitive touch switch to meet your various lighting needs; touch lamp slider to achieve 15%-100% brightness adjustment, ideal for home office reading, working, studying, drawing or relaxing.

🎁【Multifunctional & Multi-angle Adjustable Architect Desk Lamp】Consists of a rotatable lamp head and flexible metal swing arm Desk Lamps, various angle and height free adjustment, desktop illumination more uniform and bright; as a desk lamps work lamp drawing lamp at the same time, but also can be used as a camera lighting lamp, ideal for video calls and conference lighting. You can also set the brightness levels just by sliding the touchpad lightly.

🎁【50000 Hours Lifetime Work Lamp】Swing Arm Desk Lamps of Heavy Base, Giving an Elegant and professional look, Premium aluminum alloy construction acts as a passive heat sink, protecting and prolonging LED lifespan. Our table light lasts for more than 50000 hours. 20% energy consumption as incandescent bulb does.

productInformation.value: Corded Electric, 100V-240V voltage,dimmable desk light, 3 color temperatures (3500-5000K),flicker-free lighting, reading lamp, eye caring desk lamp, memory function, foldable table lamp, touch control,adjustable desk lamp,50000Hrs long life span,Energy saving, Smart LED desk lamp with light sensor, When you turn on the Smart Lighting button, Auto-adjust brightness according to the surrounding brightness. The table lamp is embedded with a dynamic light chip, which simulates the sun's light color, helping to achieve balance. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality and modern looking
reviews.reviewText: I like this desk lamp a lot. Very modern and sleek looking. Easy to use and the color & brightness adjustability is great. A little spendy, but otherwise good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these lamps. Bought two for my desk and my wife’s. Gives very nice light which can be directed towards a specific location. Have had them for nine months and not a single issue. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for finding puzzle pieces!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife to complete her puzzles. She says it is the best lamp she has ever owned. If she is happy...I am happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Incorrect color temperature
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to like this lamp. but also wanted a light that was warm white at 2700K . Product info was incorrect as the brochure clearly shows. Lowest warm white this lamp can go is 3500K. Not what I wanted. Sharing this so others aren't duped like I was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Having everything you need on a desk is super important when you work from home!
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and often find myself trying to fit everything I would need on my desk in the office on my desk at home. My biggest challenge was getting a desk light that wasn't too bulky and didn't take too much room. I saw this lamp on Amazon and thought I'd give it a try. First of all, the base is super small, and is weighted to prevent tipping over. It does not take any room on my desk at all! The lamp is tall and adjustable. I can move the swing arm to exactly where I need it. Especially working at night. It has 3 light modes that you can adjust to fit your needs. I use it mostly at night so the adjustable light is important, as well as keeping only my desk lit and not the entire room. I was impressed with this adjustable light that can be turned on and adjusted by a simple touch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost perfect LED Desk Lamp: Worth Every Penny
reviews.reviewText: Best available LED Desk Lamp for home office on Amazon.com. Light intensity is very adjustable. Range of motion for light source could be improved. Provides ample light for computer set-up, including Zoom meetings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I remember the swing arm lamp my dad had at his desk as I was growing up. It was flimsy and put out a weak light unless you were directly under it and were baking at the same time. This lamp is nothing like it and I'm really pleased I chose to get it. No springs here, just a very solid and well constructed counterbalanced light fixture. The light options are many and varied in this lamp; the light also can get extremely bright. It also has a great aesthetic. This is perfect for me. After trying several light fixtures for a bedside nightstand, I finally have exactly what I need for reading and working on my laptop while in bed (like right now).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am fully impressed with the design and display of this lamp. You will definitely need a larger space in my opinion as it is a larger extension by design. The functionality and flow for a room is just like the stock photo they use. I really like that it doesn't use a lot of heat like other lamps will.
